bibl.title: Bi’r Biḫīt: Preliminary Report on the 2012 Field Season.
bibl.note: Survey by the IFAO (since 2008), in collaboration with Macquarie University, in the Wādī ‘Araba (in the northern part of the Eastern Desert). The fieldwork at the hermitage of Bi’r Biḫīt was undertaken as a part of the survey between 20th January and 8th February 2012.

bibl.title: Bulletin of the Australian Centre for Egyptology

bibl.seg: Victor Ghica & Yann Tristant, Bi’r Biḫīt: Preliminary Report on the 2012 Field Season.

Survey by the IFAO (since 2008), in collaboration with Macquarie University, in the Wādī ‘Araba (in the northern part of the Eastern Desert). The fieldwork at the hermitage of Bi’r Biḫīt was undertaken as a part of the survey between 20th January and 8th February 2012.
